nodes.text: Sector 7 was a location in Rebel territory that Jerrod Lourdas neglected to scan so he could scan Sector 17. When Jerrod returned to Base, Harl Bess and Var Narek scolded him, telling him that if he let his guard down, the base could be overrun with Imperial forces. Jerrod was dismissive of this though, and made a joke about the whole ordeal.
